page.title: 14TRADE
page.content:
LOCAL TRADE IS SHOWN ON THE SLIDE SECTION OF THIS PROJECT BUT WILL BE COVERED HERE ALSO. THE PETROL SERVICE STATION IN HOLBEACH DROVE KNOWN TO LOCALS AS 'GAMBLES' LOCATED CENTRAL TO HOLBEACH DROVE, IS VERY POPULAR AND BESIDES SERVING PETROL THERE ARE ALSO OTHER ITEMS TO BE SOLD SUCH AS FOOD AND GIFTS. THEY ARE OPEN LONG HOURS SOMETIMES FROM SEVEN IN THE MORNING TO NINE AT NIGHT. ALSO OPEN ON SUNDAYS THEY ALSO SELL EVENING PAPERS AND SUNDAY PAPERS.
ON THE DOOR INSIDE THE SHOP POSTERS DISPLAY THE LOCAL EVENTS IN THE AREA AND ITEMS FOR SALE. AS YOU CAN SEE THIS IS AJACK OF ALL TRADES STORE AND IS VERY FRIENDLY>
